free: #e He can get himself a wife.

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Who wants to get married to him?

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Let him see for himself. (For us) old people, is it our business nowadays?
#c 讓他自己看看。對我麼老人而言，不關我們的事。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Your child (Ataw) has somebody she likes.

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e How would they have the predestination if we old people don't point it out to them?
#c 他們怎會有緣份，若我們老人家不指給他們？

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e They are afraid. It's up to us old people (for them) to know or not to know suitable people."
#c 他們害怕。那要看我麼老人家知不知道哪些人適合他們。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e We've pointed out two to him.
#c 我們幫他們指出兩個來了。
